readable.content: A girl in a pink shirt on a carnival ride with a huge stuffed animal . A girl sits on a ride with a stuffed animal next to her above a carnival . A little girl and her stuffed monkey seated on a ride above the fairgrounds . A little girl sits on a Farris wheel seat next to a giant stuffed animal . Girl and large stuffed animal riding an amuseument ride over a fair .
